author: kelly06407
content: Hey <@!489256758989029405> - Following up on last weeks ACD call, is it possible for you to run a benchmark of the existing EIP-198 test vectors? I can run the benchmark results through the new pricing formula to ensure that the new pricing formula doesn't present a DoS risk for Nethermind.

author: kelly06407
content: Hopefully the performance is sufficient that it doesn't require a change to the pricing formula or libraries used
